name: Easter Egg Drop
author: Square Media

sections.description:
This plugin makes an easter egg drop from the top of the screen after a random delay of between 1-5 seconds.

When clicked it triggers an alert box with a customisable message.
sections.installation:
Install Easter Egg Drop like you would install any other WordPress plugin.

Dashboard Method:

  1. Login to your WordPress admin and go to Plugins -> Add New
  2. Type “Easter Egg Drop” in the search bar and select this plugin
  3. Click “Install”, and then “Activate Plugin”

Upload Method:

  1. Unzip the plugin and upload the “easter-egg-drop” folder to your ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Using Easter Egg Drop

Customise options in the admin at Options -> Easter Egg Drop

Is my host supported?

Yes! This plugin should be compatible with any host.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added features: choose side of page to drop eggs, stop showing egg after popup displayed and maximum number of drops

1.0.1

  • Bugfix update

1.0

  • Initial release
